column4: I've been wanting to install linux for years but never really bothered, I tried the Ubuntu live cd the other day and Now I'm definatly gonna install it
when I boot off the live cd and click the installation button on the desktop, where will it install linux to? I have a 200gb hd with several partitions
is will ask for an  empty existing partition, to shrink and used one, or you can manually edit the partition table
